Ladder Query Service

Functions used to use the ladder query service. More...

Results fetching
 Get the entries requested when a request completed successfully.

Callback registration
 ladder query service callbacks

Callbacks

Detailed Description

Theses functions are used to query the ubi.com data providers to get ranking informations on players.
